bio:
Legate Taurinus Duilis is the Imperial Legate stationed in the town of Morthal.

He is the leader of the Imperial troops of Hjaalmarch and is in command of the military efforts against the Stormcloak rebels in the region. 

He can be found in Highmoon Hall, the residence of Morthal's ruler, Jarl Idgrod Ravencrone, unless the player chooses to take Hjaalmarch for the Stormcloaks, after which he is found in the Hjaalmarch Imperial Camp.
name: Legate Taurinus Duilis
